text: Yep. Youâ€™ll want to leverage responsive breakpoints. Once you add that object to your themes.json file, you should see those options. Check out these <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/responsive-breakpoints|docs>.
Hi all! I need to build a module where I can paste HTML code, like the free version they offer. Because I can't buy for now the next level subscription. Is there an easy way to do it?

The most likely cause is that you aren't changing the style or the or the icon_set to adjust to the new icon. Unless you know exactly which icons are being used (such as if your option above is not set to custom) then you really want to make sure you set all these parameters to variables, like you are doing with the name currently: `{% icon name="{{ icon_field.name }}" style="{{ icon_field.type }}" unicode="{{ icon_field.unicode }}" icon_set="{{ icon_field.icon_set }}" %}`
